About JMXTrans

There is currently no description associated with this project.

Project Modules

This project has declared the following modules:

Name Description
JMXTrans - agent -
JMXTrans - log -
JMXTrans - log - slf4j -
JMXTrans - output writers Implementation of OutputWriters for a number of backends. Those are kept outside of jmxtrans-core as they do bring additional dependencies in some cases and we want to strongly enforce that no code in jmxtrans-core depends on specific OutputWriter.
JMXTrans - servlet -
JMXTrans - spring -
JMXTrans - standalone JMX metrics exporter
JMXTrans - utils Utilities which have no direct connections with JmxTrans. All classes found in this module could potentially be reused by other projects. Some duplicate functionality already found in standard libraries like Guava, but as we want to keep external dependencies to a bare minimum, we have to reimplement them.
JMXTrans - core Core functionality of JmxTrans is found here. Integration with specific runtime environment is kept outside this module (agent, spring, standalone, ...), but if you just want some code to help you easily query JMX beans, this is what you need.
